00025 void InitTrain()
00026 {
00027         int i;
00028         OptionDialog dlg;
00029 
00030         dlg.m_size = gStartingNode;
00031         dlg.m_fs = gTrain_Method;
00032         dlg.m_lc = linear_classifier;
00033         dlg.m_ratio = asym_ratio;
00034         if(dlg.DoModal()!=IDOK)
00035         {
00036                 AfxMessageBox("Training cancelled.");
00037                 return;
00038         }
00039         else
00040         {
00041                 gTrain_Method = dlg.m_fs;
00042                 linear_classifier = dlg.m_lc;
00043                 asym_ratio = REAL(dlg.m_ratio);
00044         }
00045 
00046         i = gStartingNode;
00047         if(i!=1 && i<=gMaxNumNodes)
00048         {
00049                 ofstream f;
00050                 if(!BoostingInputFiles(true))
00051                 {
00052                         AfxMessageBox("All bootstrapping file used! Training finished! (finally...)");
00053                         return;
00054                 }
00055                 f.open(FileUsage_log_filename);
00056                 for(int j=0;j<gMaxNumFiles;j++) f<<gFileUsed[j]<<" ";
00057                 f.close();
00058         }
00059         AfxGetApp()->BeginWaitCursor();
00060         WriteRangeFile();
00061         while(i<=gMaxNumNodes)
00062         {
00063                 bool result;
00064 
00065                 result = gCascade->OneRound(i);
00066                 if(result==false)
00067                 {
00068                         AfxGetApp()->EndWaitCursor();
00069                         AfxMessageBox("All bootstrapping file used! Training finished! (finally...)");
00070                         return;
00071                 }
00072                 i++;
00073         }
00074         AfxGetApp()->EndWaitCursor();
00075 }

00077 const bool BoostingInputFiles(const bool discard)
00078 {
00079         int i,pointer,index;
00080         IntImage im;
00081         ofstream of;
00082 
00083         im.SetSize(CSize(gSx+1,gSy+1));
00084         gCascade->LoadDefaultCascade();
00085 
00086         pointer=gFaceCount;
00087         for(i=gFaceCount;i<gTotalCount;i++) 
00088         {
00089                 if(discard) break;
00090                 if(gCascade->ApplyImagePatch(gTrainSet[i])!=0)
00091                 {
00092                         if(pointer!=i) SwapIntImage(gTrainSet[i],gTrainSet[pointer]);
00093                         pointer++;
00094                         if(pointer==gTotalCount) break;
00095                 }
00096         }
00097         if(pointer==gTotalCount) return true;
00098 
00099         index = 0;
00100         while(pointer<gTotalCount)
00101         {
00102                 if(index==gBootstrapSize) 
00103                 {
00104                         if(bootstrap_level==max_bootstrap_level-1)
00105                                 return false;
00106                         else
00107                         {
00108                                 bootstrap_level++;
00109                                 for(i=0;i<gMaxNumFiles;i++) gFileUsed[i] = 0;
00110                                 index=0;
00111                                 pointer=gFaceCount;
00112                         }
00113                 }
00114                 if(gFileUsed[index]==1)
00115                 {
00116                         index++;
00117                         continue;
00118                 }
00119                 gCascade->ApplyOriginalSizeForInputBoosting(gBootstrap_Filenames[index],pointer);
00120                 gFileUsed[index]=1;
00121                 index++;
00122         }
00123 
00124         for(i=0;i<gTotalCount;i++)
00125         {
00126                 int k,t;
00127                 memcpy(im.buf,gTrainSet[i].buf,(gSx+1)*(gSy+1)*sizeof(im.buf[0]));
00128                 for(k=0;k<=gSy;k++) gTrainSet[i].data[0][k] = 0;
00129                 for(k=0;k<=gSx;k++) gTrainSet[i].data[k][0] = 0;
00130                 for(k=1;k<=gSx;k++)
00131                         for(t=1;t<=gSy;t++)
00132                                 gTrainSet[i].data[k][t] = im.data[k][t]-im.data[k-1][t]-im.data[k][t-1]+im.data[k-1][t-1];
00133         }
00134 
00135         of.open(gTrainset_Filename,ios_base::out | ios_base::binary);
00136         of<<gTotalCount<<endl;
00137         unsigned char* writebuf;
00138         writebuf = new unsigned char[gSx*gSy]; ASSERT(writebuf!=NULL);
00139         for(i=0;i<gTotalCount;i++)
00140         {
00141                 of<<gTrainSet[i].label<<endl;
00142                 of<<gSx<<" "<<gSy<<endl;
00143                 for(int k=0;k<gSx;k++)
00144                         for(int t=0;t<gSy;t++)
00145                                 writebuf[k*gSy+t] = (unsigned char)((int)gTrainSet[i].data[k+1][t+1]);
00146                 of.write((char*)writebuf,gSx*gSy);
00147                 of<<endl;
00148         }
00149         delete[] writebuf; writebuf=NULL;
00150         of.close();
00151 
00152         for(i=0;i<gTotalCount;i++) gTrainSet[i].CalculateVarianceAndIntegralImageInPlace();
00153         for(i=gFaceCount;i<gTotalCount;i++) 
00154         {
00155                 if(gCascade->ApplyImagePatch(gTrainSet[i])==0)
00156                         ; //AfxMessageBox("Something is wrong?");
00157         }
00158 
00159         return true;
00160 }
00161 
00162 void BackupIntermediateFile(const CString filename, const int round)
00163 {
00164         CString savename;
00165         CString name,ext;
00166         int pos;
00167 
00168         bool backup = false;
00169 
00170         if(backup==false) return;
00171 
00172         pos = filename.ReverseFind('\\');
00173         if(pos>0)
00174                 savename = filename.Right(filename.GetLength()-pos-1);
00175         else
00176                 savename = filename;
00177 
00178         pos = savename.ReverseFind('.');
00179         name = savename.Left(pos);
00180         ext = savename.Right(savename.GetLength()-pos);
00181 
00182         savename.Format("%d",round);
00183 
00184         savename = gBackup_Directory_Name + name + savename + ext;
00185         CopyFile(filename,savename,FALSE);
00186 }

00188 const bool CascadeClassifier::OneRound(const int round)
00189 {
00190         ofstream f;
00191         bool result;
00192         int i;
00193         AdaBoostClassifier ada;
00194         CWnd* pwnd;
00195         CString str;
00196 
00197         pwnd = AfxGetMainWnd();
00198 
00199         BackupIntermediateFile(gTrainset_Filename,round);
00200 
00201         str.Format("Training node: %d",round);
00202         pwnd->SetWindowText(str);
00203         ada.TrainLDS(gNof[round-1],true,gGoal_Method);
00204 
00205         if(gTrain_Method==TRAIN_ADA)
00206                 BackupIntermediateFile(gAda_Log_Filename,round);
00207         else
00208                 BackupIntermediateFile(FFS_log_filename,round);
00209 
00210         BackupIntermediateFile(gCascade_Filename,round);
00211 
00212         str.Format("Training node %d finished. Bootstrapping non-face data for next node.",round);
00213         pwnd->SetWindowText(str);
00214         result = BoostingInputFiles(false);
00215 
00216         f.open(FileUsage_log_filename);
00217         for(i=0;i<gMaxNumFiles;i++) f<<gFileUsed[i]<<" ";
00218         f.close();
00219 
00220         BackupIntermediateFile(FileUsage_log_filename,round);
00221 
00222         return result;
00223 }

00225 void WriteSimpleClassifiers(void)
00226 {
00227         int x1,x2,x3,x4,y1,y2,y3,y4;
00228         SimpleClassifier sc;
00229         int index;
00230         ofstream f;
00231 
00232         int pickup=9;
00233 
00234         f.open("classifiers.txt");
00235         index = 0;
00236 
00237         for(x1=0;x1<gSx;x1+=1)
00238                 for(x3=x1+2;x3<=gSx;x3+=2)
00239                         for(y1=0;y1<gSy;y1+=1)
00240                                 for(y3=y1+1;y3<=gSy;y3+=1)
00241                                 {
00242                                         x2 = (x1+x3)/2;
00243                                         y2 = y4 = x4 = -1;
00244                                         sc.type = 0; sc.error = 0.0;
00245                                         sc.x1 = x1; sc.x2 = x2; sc.x3 = x3; sc.x4 = x4;
00246                                         sc.y1 = y1; sc.y2 = y2; sc.y3 = y3; sc.y4 = y4;
00247                                         sc.parity = 0;
00248                                         sc.thresh = 0.0;
00249                                         if(index%10==pickup) sc.WriteToFile(f);
00250                                         index++;
00251                                 }
00252 
00253         for(x1=0;x1<gSx;x1+=1)
00254                 for(x3=x1+1;x3<=gSx;x3+=1)
00255                         for(y1=0;y1<gSy;y1+=1)
00256                                 for(y3=y1+2;y3<=gSy;y3+=2)
00257                                 {
00258                                         y2 = (y1+y3)/2;
00259                                         x2 = x4 = y4 = -1;
00260                                         sc.type = 1; sc.error = 0.0;
00261                                         sc.x1 = x1; sc.x2 = x2; sc.x3 = x3; sc.x4 = x4;
00262                                         sc.y1 = y1; sc.y2 = y2; sc.y3 = y3; sc.y4 = y4;
00263                                         sc.parity = 0;
00264                                         sc.thresh = 0.0;
00265                                         if(index%10==pickup) sc.WriteToFile(f);
00266                                         index++;
00267                                 }
00268 
00269         for(x1=0;x1<gSx;x1++)
00270                 for(x4=x1+3;x4<=gSx;x4+=3)
00271                         for(y1=0;y1<gSy;y1+=1)
00272                                 for(y3=y1+1;y3<=gSy;y3+=1)
00273                                 {
00274                                         x2 = x1 + (x4-x1)/3;
00275                                         x3 = x2 + (x4-x1)/3;
00276                                         y2 = y4 = -1;
00277                                         sc.type = 2; sc.error = 0.0;
00278                                         sc.x1 = x1; sc.x2 = x2; sc.x3 = x3; sc.x4 = x4;
00279                                         sc.y1 = y1; sc.y2 = y2; sc.y3 = y3; sc.y4 = y4;
00280                                         sc.parity = 0;
00281                                         sc.thresh = 0.0;
00282                                         if(index%10==pickup) sc.WriteToFile(f);
00283                                         index++;
00284                                 }
00285 
00286         for(x1=0;x1<gSx;x1++)
00287                 for(x3=x1+1;x3<=gSx;x3+=1)
00288                         for(y1=0;y1<gSy;y1++)
00289                                 for(y4=y1+3;y4<=gSy;y4+=3)
00290                                 {
00291                                         y2 = y1 + (y4-y1)/3;
00292                                         y3 = y2 + (y4-y1)/3;
00293                                         x2 = x4 = -1;
00294                                         sc.type = 3; sc.error = 0.0;
00295                                         sc.x1 = x1; sc.x2 = x2; sc.x3 = x3; sc.x4 = x4;
00296                                         sc.y1 = y1; sc.y2 = y2; sc.y3 = y3; sc.y4 = y4;
00297                                         sc.parity = 0;
00298                                         sc.thresh = 0.0;
00299                                         if(index%10==pickup) sc.WriteToFile(f);
00300                                         index++;
00301                                 }
00302 
00303         for(x1=0;x1<gSx;x1+=1)
00304                 for(x3=x1+2;x3<=gSx;x3+=2)
00305                         for(y1=0;y1<gSy;y1+=1)
00306                                 for(y3=y1+2;y3<=gSy;y3+=2)
00307                                 {
00308                                         x2 = (x1+x3)/2;
00309                                         y2 = (y1+y3)/2;
00310                                         x4 = y4 = -1;
00311                                         sc.type = 4; sc.error = 0.0;
00312                                         sc.x1 = x1; sc.x2 = x2; sc.x3 = x3; sc.x4 = x4;
00313                                         sc.y1 = y1; sc.y2 = y2; sc.y3 = y3; sc.y4 = y4;
00314                                         sc.parity = 0;
00315                                         sc.thresh = 0.0;
00316                                         if(index%10==pickup) sc.WriteToFile(f);
00317                                         index++;
00318                                 }
00319 
00320         f.close();
00321 }

00323 void SubSampleClassifiers()
00324 {
00325         ofstream f;
00326         int i;
00327 
00328         f.open("classifiers.txt");
00329         for(i=0;i<gTotalFeatures/10;i++)
00330         {
00331                 gClassifiers[i*10].WriteToFile(f);
00332         }
00333         f.close();
00334 }
